column3: UCD School of Public Health, Physiotherapy and Sports Science
column5: Graduate Taught (level 9 nfq, credits 90)In this MSc programme you will learn about the cutting-edge science that underpins diverse aspects of coaching, e.g. tapering and peaking to optimise performance, the coach-athlete relationship, performance and notational analysis in sport. You will also undertake original research of your own on a topic that is relevant to you. Critical evaluation of academic knowledge and its practical application is a distinctive feature of this advanced programme.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
